response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to secure this valuable asset at a significant discount. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
